ValenciaR 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    BC()

    Computes the Bray-Curtis dissimilarity between the rows of two matrices

    assign_to_Valencia_clusters()

    Assign samples to Valencia clusters

    build_Valencia_tax_table()

    Builds a pseudo taxonomic table from Valencia taxa names

    convert_to_Valencia_taxonomy()

    "Converts" a taxonomic count/proportion table to match the Valencia cluster taxonomy.

    .convert()

    Aggregate the counts/proportions from the input matrix by taxonomic label

    .label_topics_1_model()

    Label topics from a single model to match the closest Valencia sub-CST

    example_data

    Example dataset

    get_Valencia_clusters()

    Retrieve Valencia centroids

    label_topics()

    Label topics to match the closest Valencia sub-CST

    match_taxonomies()

    Matches taxonomic tables

    taxonomic_levels

    Taxonomic levels
